author: GameSpot
description:
Romeo Is A Deadman is Grasshopper Manufacture latest action game created by Suda 51 and Ren Yamazaki. It’s an all new IP from the developer, and it feels like Grasshopper is firing on all cylinders. Kurt Indovina got hands-on with the game, and got to fight through zombies, monsters, and a giant naked headless woman (which he was a big fan of). Here’s the preview.

#romeoisadeadman #gaming #gamespot #gamescom #gamescom2025
title: Romeo Is A Dead Man Is Grasshopper Manufacture Firing On All Cylinders

author: GameSpot
description: The Chinese Room is taking a big bite out of vampire culture in Seattle with its moody RPG, Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2. Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 releases on October 21, 2025. Learn more about in this latest preview from Gamescom 2025.
title: Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 Has A Boomer Vampire In It
